short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: browser extension for productivity in the browser, alert when you are spending too much time on a website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser extension designed to help users manage their browsing experience more effectively. With features tailored to user preferences, it allows for customizable alerts based on specific actions such as excessive scrolling or prolonged time spent on a webpage. Users can configure settings for individual websites, choosing from options like scroll detection, timer-based alerts, or blocking access. 

- Dark or light theme depending on the operating system
- Alert types
- Open Source, the code is public

The code is public, you can observe and improve it.
